actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-959, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to. Upon the adoption of this resolution, it shall be in order to consider the conference report on H.R. 5678. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 217.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 5678) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 5678 (FY 1993 appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies).

titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 5678) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.
